name: piped
description: Piped is a privacy-friendly YouTube frontend that can be self-hosted. It offers ad-free, tracking-free access with clean UI, subscriptions, and streaming without Google's infrastructure.
features: Privacy-focused streaming: Watch YouTube videos without tracking, ads, or Google account requirements.
Subscription management: Subscribe to channels and receive updates without a YouTube account.
Playlist support: Create and manage playlists independently from YouTube's infrastructure.
Video quality selection: Choose preferred video quality and format for streaming or downloading.
SponsorBlock integration: Automatically skip sponsored segments, intros, and outros in videos.
Comments viewing: Read video comments without exposing your identity or activity to Google.
Feed customization: View subscriptions in a chronological feed without algorithmic recommendations.
Instance federation: Connect to multiple Piped instances for redundancy and load distribution.
Proxy streaming: Stream videos through proxy servers to hide your IP address from YouTube.
Import subscriptions: Transfer YouTube subscriptions using export files for easy migration.
Lightweight interface: Fast, minimal UI designed for efficient video browsing and playback.
Mobile optimized: Responsive design works seamlessly on smartphones and tablets.
